div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation where concept is-a _ObservationInterpretationChange

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ObservationInterpretationChangeObservationInterpretationChangeInterpretations of change of quantity and/or severity. At most one of B or W and one of U or D allowed.

description.value: Interpretations of change of quantity and/or severity, such as "better", "worse", "increased", etc. At most one of B or W and one of U or D allowed.
